sense.def:
A race
je tekmovanje, pri katerem zmaga tisti, ki je najhitrejši, na primer v teku ali vožnji.

seg.quote: She came second in the race.
The race is run through the streets of London.

sense.def:
A race for power or control
je tekmovanje za to, kdo bo prišel na oblast ali kdo bo dobil moč.

seg.quote: The race for the White House is now on.

sense.def:
To race someone
ali
to race against someone
pomeni tekmovati z nekom, kdo bo hitrejši.

seg.quote: They would often race one another to the bus stop.
She has raced against some of the best runners in the country.

sense.def:
To race somewhere
pomeni, da nekdo nekam gre, kolikor hitro more.

seg.quote: We had to race across London to get the train.

sense.def:
Kadar človekovo srce
races
, bije zelo hitro.

seg.quote: His heart raced as he saw the plane coming in to land.

sense.def:
A race
je tudi ena izmed velikih skupin, v katere delimo ljudi glede na telesne značilnosti, na primer barvo kože.

seg.quote: ...discrimination on the grounds of colour or race.

sense.def:
Kadar neki položaj opišemo kot
a race against time
, s tem mislimo, da moramo delati zelo hitro, da bi nekaj dokončali.
